level.heading: Classification of chimneys.
level.text: ยง 27-857 Classification of chimneys. Chimneys shall be classified as follows: (a) Low temperature chimneys. Chimneys designed and constructed to exhaust the products of combustion from low temperature equipment as defined in subchapter fourteen of this chapter. (b) Medium temperature chimneys. Chimneys designed and constructed to exhaust the products of combustion from medium temperature equipment as defined in subchapter fourteen of this chapter. (c) High temperature chimneys. Chimneys designed and constructed to exhaust the products of combustion from high temperature equipment as defined in subchapter fourteen of this chapter.
